actions.value: During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.  When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your Move ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add +1 %game.action.move%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your Move ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.action.jump%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add +1 %game.action.attack%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

When attacked by an adjacent enemy, you may place one characer token on this card to gain %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.condition.poison% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn, you may place one characer token on this card to perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self". When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
When damaged by an attack, you may place one characer token on this card to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to gain Advantage for one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.condition.curse% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn, remove %game.condition.infect% from Self or adjacent ally.
Your attacks are unaffected by %game.action.retaliate%.
During your melee Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 4 to one attack.
During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 3, %game.action.range:2%".
At the end of your turn, if you moved four or more hexes during your turn, one adjacent enemy suffers one damage.
During your Move abilities, you may move through enemies.
During your Move ability, add +2 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump%.
During your Heal ability, add +2 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen% to each heal.
You are immune to %game.condition.immobilize%. At the end of your turn, if you moved zeo hexes on your turn, perform "%game.action.move% 1"
During your turn, Recover %game.card.recover% one lost card played this round.
Gain Advantage on all attacks you perform while %game.condition.invisible%.
When attacked, consider any %game.attackmodifier.plus1% modifier card the enemy draws to be a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.
When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack.
When you would gain one or more negative conditions, prevent the conditions.
On the next two attacks targeting you peformed by adjacent enemies, gain %game.action.retaliate% 2 for the attack.
When your hit point would be reduced to 0 by an attack targeting you, instead suffer no damage and gain %game.condition.invisible%.
During your turn, swap positions with one enemy within %game.action.range:5%.
During your turn, replace one adjacent obstacle tile with a money token.
During your turn, perform "%game.action.heal% 5, %game.condition.poison%, Self".
During your turn, create one %game.condition.immobilize% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.
During your turn, create one %game.condition.stun% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.
During your turn, force an enemy within %game.action.range:5% to perform a "%game.action.move% 2, %game.action.jump%" ability with you controlling the ability.
During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.action.push% 2 to all your attacks.
When attacked, gain %game.action.retaliate% 1, %game.action.range:3% for the attack.
During your melee Attack ability, suffer 1 damage to add %game.condition.curse% to all your attacks.
When attacked by an adjacent enemy, gain %game.action.retaliate% 3 for the attack.
During your melee Attack ability, do not draw an attack modifier card for one attack.
During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 2, %game.action.range:3%, %game.action.pierce% 2".
During your Heal action, add +2 %game.action.heal% to each Heal.
During your ranged Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 2 to one attack.
During your turn, one summoned ally you own performs %game.action.move% +0 %game.action.attack% +0 with you controlling the abilities.
During your turn, perform one of the following: Recover %game.card.recover% one discarded card | %game.action.heal% 3, Self | Add +2 %game.action.attack% to your next attack this turn.
During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.wound% to all your attacks.
fire
Gain Advantage on all your melee attacks while you are occupying difficult terrain.
During your Attack ability, add %game.condition.poison% 2 to one attack.
During you Attack ability, add %game.condition.disarm% to one attack.
During your turn, remove all positive conditions from all enemies within %game.action.range:2%.  This can be used on enemies that have %game.condition.invisible%.
During your turn, perform "%game.action.heal% 5, Self"
wild
You are immune to %game.condition.disarm%, even if this item is spent. During your turn gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round.
round
At the end of your turn, all enemies consider all empty hexes within %game.action.range:2% of you to be difficult terrain for the round.
round
When you are damage by an attack targeting you, suffer half (rounded down) the damage instead.
When an ally targets you with a Heal ability, remove one negative condition from yourself before the Heal and gain %game.condition.strengthen%.
During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack targeting an enemy adjacent to one of your allies.
During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.immobilize% to all your attacks.
During your single-target melee Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 2 and %game.action.pull% 1 to the attack and you may target one enemy within 2 hexes.
During your turn, perform:
wound
On the next three Heal abilities targeting you, you may either first remove all negative conditions from yourself or gain %game.condition.strengthen%.
During your turn, perform "%game.action.pull% 2, Target one ally or enemy within %game.action.range:3%."
Whenever you would suffer damage from %game.condition.wound% instead perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self"
Add +1 %game.action.range% to all your ranged abilities peformed while adjacent to an obstacle. Whenever you enter a hex with a trap, you may choose not to spring the trap.
Whenever you use the default top action of an ability card, you may perform a "%game.action.heal% 2, %game.action.range:1%" ability instead of an "%game.action.attack% 2" ability.
During your Heal ability targeting at least one ally, add +1 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen% to each Heal.
When attacked this round, you and all adjacent allies consider any negative and %game.attackmodifier.null% attack modifiers drawn to be %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.
During your Heal ability, add +3 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.wound% to each Heal.
During your Heal ability, double the value of each Heal. If this Heal ability removes %game.condition.wound%, this item is spent %game.card.spent% instead of consumed.
During your turn, one ally within %game.action.range:2% may perform one of the following: %game.action.attack% 2| %game.action.move% 2| %game.action.heal% 2, Self.
When an adjacent ally is damage by an attack targeting them, that ally gains %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack and removes all negative conditions applied by the attack.
When an ally within %game.action.range:5% would be damaged by an attack targeting them, they suffer no damage instead.
During your Heal ability targeting at least one ally add +2 %game.action.heal% %game.condition.strengthen% and %game.condition.bless% to each Heal.
During you turn one ally within %game.action.range:3% may perform one of the following: %game.action.attack% 3 | %game.action.move% 3 | %game.action.heal% 3, Self.

During your turn, create two water difficult terrain tiles in hexes within %game.action.range:3% that contain no overlay tiles. %game.condition.muddle% all figures within %game.action.range:3% occupying a water tile.
During your single-target ranged Attack ability, turn the attack into the following:
(0,0,target)|(1,0,target)
During your single-targetranged Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and turn the attack into the following:
(0,0,target)|(1,0,target)
During your turn, you and all allies gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round.
round
During your turn, all adjacent allies gain %game.action.shield% equal to your current Shield value from abilities for the round.
round
During your turn, open one unlocked closed door within %game.action.range:2%.
During your turn, open one unlocked closed door within %game.action.range:2%.
During your Move ability, double the value of the movement.
During your Move ability, add %game.action.jump% and double the value of the movement.
During your turn, you may %game.element.consume.earth% to perform "%game.action.attack% 1, %game.action.range:3%, %game.condition.poison%".
During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 1, %game.action.range:4%, %game.condition.poison%". You may %game.element.consume.earth% to ADD %game.condition.target%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.ice%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.air%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.fire%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.earth%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.light%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.dark%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.wild%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you or an adjacent ally, the attacked figure gains %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.
During your turn, perform %game.action.heal% 3 %game.condition.regenerate% Affect self and one adjacent ally.
(X is 1, 2, 3) During your turn, forgo your top action to perform %game.action.attack% X + 1 %game.action.range:2% %game.action.target% 4 - X.
During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.action.push% 1 to a single attack.
Your movement may enter and end in hexes containing obstacles as if you had %game.action.fly%.

Crate one trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%. If you or an ally trigger this trap, that figure gains %game.action.fly% for the round. | Any enemy that enters a hex with this trap triggers it and loses %game.action.fly% for the round.
You %game.action.loot% each hex this summon enters. You control this summon's actions.
During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.rupture% to one attack.
After your move ability, perform %game.action.push% 1 Target one adjacent enemy. Add +1 %game.action.push% if you have move 4 or more hexes this round.
During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.action.pierce% 2 to one attack targeting an enemy with %game.condition.wound% or %game.condition.rupture%.
On your next three melee attacks targeting enemies with at least one negative condition, gain Advantage.
The next two times you would lose a card from your hand to negate suffering damage, discard it instead and gain %game.condition.wound%.
